metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1888 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
pip before 1.3 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a file in the /tmp/pip-build temporary directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pip - 1.3.1-0ubuntu1
python-pip-whl - 1.3.1-0ubuntu1
python3-pip - 1.3.1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-pip package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.1-0ubuntu1').
